Cool, clear Sweetwater finally flows into Kaitāia taps https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/cool-cool-clear-sweetwater-finally-finally-finally-finally-finally-finally-finall-finall-to-kaitaia-taps/5z5bjcrfabrfajrfajrmihwif6a7tkqm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/cool-cool-clear-sweetwater-finally-finally-finally-finally-finally-finally-finall-finall-to-kaitaia-taps/5z5bjcrfabrfajrfajrmihwif6a7tkqm/ Mike DinsdaleAfter 5 years and $17 million Kaitāia gets Sweetwater from aquifer Wed, 19 Feb 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Far North District Council water treatment supervisor Regan Jones tastes the cool, clear water from the Sweetwaters Aquifer that is finally flowing through Kaitāia Water Treatment Plant. Also present are representatives from the council, Ventia, United Civil and Veolia, which installed the treatment membrane at the plant.
